revised_title: Differential Gene Expression in Plants: The Expression of Heat-Shock Genes
tldr: This article discusses the expression of heat-shock genes in higher plants, focusing on the molecular analysis of soybean low-molecular-mass heat-shock proteins. The authors explore the connection between the synthesis of these proteins and the development of thermal tolerance in plants, as well as the potential role of heat-shock proteins in various cellular processes.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
